sections.heading: authorized; parties restricted
sections.text: A series limited liability company may be party to a merger in accordance with sections 21-171 to 21-174, this section, and sections 21-531 to 21-534 only if:(1) each other party to the merger is a limited liability company; and(2) the surviving company is not created

21-530.Merger authorized; parties restricted.

A series limited liability company may be party to a merger in accordance with sections 21-171 to 21-174, this section, and sections 21-531 to 21-534 only if:

(1) each other party to the merger is a limited liability company; and

(2) the surviving company is not created in the merger.

SourceLaws 2018, LB1121, ยง 31.
